channel.title: Help on custom yell tag
channel.description: Ok well on my rsps i made a custom yell tag for myself in all diffrent colors.The only problem is i dont know how to write the colors in bold.If someone helps me out ill do a victory dance around my house. im useing a 317 source and its delta
